attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/other/zero/doubletime.png} tip={Doubletime (Transcendent Skill)} val={up to +10%}> <bg type={debuff} src={/class-icons/other/zero/time-distortion.png} tip={Time Distortion (Transcendent Skill)} val={+25% within zone}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/other/zero/time-holding.png} tip={Time Holding (Transcendent Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/impenetrable-skin.png} tip={Impenetrable Skin (5th Job)} val={+6% when hit up to +30%}> <bg type={beta} val={Beta  }> <bg src={/class-icons/other/zero/heavy-sword-mastery.png} tip={Heavy Sword Mastery (Lv. 100)} val={+50%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg type={opt} src={/images/equipment/lapis-type-9.png} tip={Lapis Type 9 (Equipment)} src={/images/equipment/lazuli-type-9.png} tip={Lazuli Type 9 (Equipment)} val={+30%}> <bg type={beta} val={Beta  }> <bg src={/class-icons/other/zero/heavy-sword-mastery.png} tip={Heavy Sword Mastery (Lv. 100)} val={+30%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/other/zero/resolution-time.png} tip={Resolution Time (Transcendent Skill)} val={+25%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/other/zero/long-sword-mastery.png} tip={Long Sword Mastery (Lv. 100)} src={/class-icons/other/zero/heavy-sword-mastery.png} tip={Heavy Sword Mastery (Lv. 100)} val={+23%}> × <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/other/zero/chrono-break.png} tip={Chrono Break (5th Job)} val={+36%} val={(+46% instead w/ 6th Job upgrade)}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/transcendent-rhinnes-prayer.png} tip={Transcendent Rhinne's Prayer (5th Job)} val={+8%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/transcendent.png} tip={Transcendent (5th Job)} val={+5%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/weapon-aura.png} tip={Weapon Aura (5th Job)} val={+6%}>

details: This skill is leveled up by completing the Zero storyline

info:
To create a Zero character, you must have a character that is above Lv. 100 on the same World

As of May 2024, Zero can be created at anytime given the requirement above is met

details: Zero unlocks new skills as you level up and will be able to max everything
Zero continues to gain Skill Points (SP) until Lv. 200
Put one SP into each skill first that is available
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/moon-strike.png} tip={Moon Strike / Shadow Strike / Rising Slash}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/piercing-thrust.png} tip={Piercing Thrust / Air Raid}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/flash-assault.png} tip={Flash Assault / Flash Cut}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/spin-cutter.png} tip={Blade Ring (Spin Cutter) / Throwing Weapon}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/rolling-cross.png} tip={Rolling Cross / Spin Driver}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/rolling-assault.png} tip={Rolling Assault / Blade Tempest}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/wind-cutter.png} tip={Wind Cutter / Giga Crash}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/wind-striker.png} tip={Wind Striker / Falling Star}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/storm-break.png} tip={Storm Break / Groundbreaker}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/shadow-rain.png} tip={Shadow Rain}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good

7 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_Each skill above should appear in 2 nodes_>

notes: Nodes provide boosts for both Alpha and Beta's skills

extraContent.title: Alpha and Beta
extraContent.content:
Zero starts at Level 100 and does not use MP and instead use Time Force (TF) which quickly regenerates

With Zero, you control two characters Alpha and Beta. Both Alpha and Beta have their own HP and TF. Using attacks of the opposite character will swap you between Alpha and Beta. While the other is not active, they will slowly regenerate HP and TF. As well, both characters can be decorated differently and wear clothing specific to their gender. Non-gender specific clothing can be equipped by both at the same time if desired

Zero's weapon is also special in which it upgrades for free every 10 levels up to Lv. 170. Within the Mirror World, monsters will drop Weapon Points (WP) that can be used to reroll a weapon's Bonus Stats and Potential

primary.name: Dual Combat
primary.shortDesc: [Tag]: While on standby, use Zero's skills to switch attackers\nCooldown: 3 sec\n[Assist]: After using Tag to switch, for up to 3 seconds, use Assist for fire support. Cannot be activated while using the previous Assist skill.
details: [Tag]: To switch between Alpha and Beta, use skills for the corresponding character
[Assist]: After using Tag to switch, for up to 3 seconds, the other character will assist you by attacking when you attack
Right-clicking the skill will toggle Forward Tag ON/OFF preventing you from moving forward when activating Tag

primary.name: Resolution Time
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Final Damage by 25%, Critical Rate by 20%, Attack Speed by 1, Strength by 50, Max HP by 15%, and Max Speed by 20
details: This skill is leveled up by completing the Zero storyline

primary.name: Temple Recall
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 10, returns to Zero's Temple\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Divine Aura
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 20, Attack Power: +20, Magic ATT: +20, Attack Speed: +1, Speed: +20, Jump: +10, Defense: +500, All Elemental Resistance: +10%, and All Abnormal Status Resistance: +10%

primary.name: Burst Jump
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 5, while jumping, use the jump key to jump certain distance\nCan be linked with Burst Step
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, pressing the Up Arrow and Jump Key will perform a vertical jump
Upon using vertical jump, <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/burst-step.png} tip={Burst Step (Transcendent Skill)}> vertical dash cannot be used before landing

primary.name: Burst Step
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 5, press arrow key and then use the skill to move in the corresponding direction\nDouble-tap an arrow key to move in that direction\nUpward Burst Step can't be used immediately after using upward Burst Jump.
primary.desc: Pressing any directional Arrow Key twice will dash towards that direction
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot, pressing the Skill Key plus an Arrow Key will activate Burst Step
Can be used on ladders and links with <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/burst-jump.png} tip={Burst Jump (Transcendent Skill)}> except the vertical jump
Upon using, <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/burst-jump.png} tip={Burst Jump (Transcendent Skill)}> vertical jump cannot be used before landing
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys

primary.name: Rhinne's Protection
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 10, Goddess Rhinne appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: The Transcendents' Will
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Doubletime
primary.shortDesc:
Reduces Zero's attack skill cooldown by 4 seconds (excluding used skill, Transcendent skill, 5th Job skills, and some 6th job skills).
[Detect]: When Alpha attacks, damage increases by 1% for 20 seconds. Can stack up to 5 times.
[Strength]: When Beta attacks, damage increases by 1% for 20 seconds. Can stack up to 5 times
Effect for [Detect] and [Strength] remains even when tagged.
primary.desc: Successful attacks reduce the cooldown of other attack skills and grants a stacking buff
details: <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/doubletime-recon.png} tip={Doubletime - Recon (Transcendent Skill)}> [Alpha - Detect]: Increases %Damage
<tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/doubletime-strength.png} tip={Doubletime - Strength (Transcendent Skill)}> [Beta - Strength]: Increases %Damage
Excludes Transcendent, 5th Job, and some 6th Job skills
Effects persist even when tagged

primary.name: Time Distortion
primary.shortDesc:
Time Force Cost: 30, Area of Time created for 30 sec
[Enemies within the area]: Every 4 sec, buff cancels, damage taken increases by 25%, and stuns normal monsters
[Party members within the area]: Every 4 sec, Nullify Magic and removes Abnormal Status, Attack Speed: +1
Cooldown: 240 sec
primary.desc: Create a zone that affects on enemies and party members
details: [Enemy]: Increases damage taken and stuns. Every 4 secs, enemies will be buff canceled
[Party Member]: Increases Attack Speed (by 1 stage). Every 4 secs, removes Abnormal Statuses

primary.name: Time Holding
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 10, Invincible for 15 sec, resets cooldowns for all skills.\nIncreases damage by 10% for 90 seconds when Zero is Level 200 or above.\nCooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Resets skill cooldowns for all applicable skills and grants invincibility and unlimited Time Force while buff is active
details: Increases %Damage when Zero is Lv. 200 or above

primary.name: Rewind
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 10, when you get knocked out you use up the buff instead, restoring all HP and becoming invincible for 2 seconds\nCooldown: 1800 sec
primary.desc: While active, when hit with a fatal attack, you are revived
details: Restores all your HP and makes you invincible for a few seconds

primary.name: Shadow Rain
primary.shortDesc:
Time Force Cost: 50,
[Beta]: Damage: 1600%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Max Hits: 7
[Alpha]: Damage: 1600%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Max Hits: 7
Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Alpha and Beta combine forces to unleash an ultimate attack
details: Applies <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/critical-bind.png} tip={Critical Bind (Beta, Lv. 185)}> to targets hit

primary.name: Focused Time
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 10, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Moon Strike
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 3, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Pull in enemies while dealing damage
details: Follow-up Attacks occur when you press the same button consecutively, for example <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/moon-strike.png} tip={Moon Strike (Alpha, Lv. 100)}><bp_Follow-up Attacks share the same key as its Active Attack_>

primary.name: Piercing Thrust
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 5, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Push enemies back while dealing damage

primary.name: Shadow Strike
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 7, Damage: 195%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 8.\n[Blade]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 310%, Number of Attacks: 1.
primary.desc: Teleport to the nearest enemy and strike nearby enemies in the direction of a pressed Arrow Key
details: If there is no enemy in sight, will teleport a short distance
If no Arrow Key is pressed, you will not be teleported
Sends out a blade that pierces through enemies<bp_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: Flash Assault
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 9, Damage: 165%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Dash forward while damaging enemies

primary.name: Spin Cutter
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 11, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Swirl in place to damage surrounding enemies

primary.name: Advanced Spin Cutter
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 11, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 8.\n[Blade]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 130%, Number of Attacks: 4, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +100%p
details: Increases %Damage and number of hits
Now creates blades that pierces through enemies<bp_Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters by a flat amountc_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: Rolling Cross
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 13, Damage: 215%, Number of Attacks: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Leap up while spinning your sword

primary.name: Rolling Assault
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 15, Damage: 275%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Spin back down while pushing enemies back

primary.name: Grand Rolling Cross
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 13, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 365%, Number of Attacks: 12.\n[Blade]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 2, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +110%p.\nCooldown: 10 sec
details: Increases %Damage of attack
Now creates blades that pierces through enemies<bp_Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters by a flat amountc_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: Advanced Rolling Assault
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 375%, Number of Attacks: 12.\n[Blade]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 3, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +60%p
details: Increases %Damage and number of hits
Now creates blades that pierces through enemies<bp_Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters by a flat amountc_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: Wind Cutter
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 17, Damage: 165%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 8.\n[Vortex]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 110% per 0.5 sec, Number of Attacks: 3, Duration: 3 sec.\nCooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Slash forward creating vortexes on enemies hit

primary.name: Wind Striker
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 21, Damage: 215%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 8.\n[Vortex]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 215% per 0.5 sec, Number of Attacks: 4, Duration: 3 sec.
primary.desc: Slash forward again to send any vortexes flying

primary.name: Storm Break
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 21, Damage: 215%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 8.\n[Vortex]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 215% per 0.5 sec, Number of Attacks: 4, Duration: 3 sec.
primary.desc: Deal a final slash that creates another vortex that pushes enemies away
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Advanced Storm Break
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 21, Damage: 335%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Max Hits: 10\n[Vortex]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 335% per 0.5 sec, Number of Attacks: 4, Duration of Vortex: 3 sec.\n[Shock Field]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Duration: 3, Damage Over Time: 230% damage per 1 sec, Normal Enemy Damage: +220% points
details: Increases %Damage of attack
Vortex now leaves a lingering Shock Field that continuously damages enemies within it<bp_Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters by a flat amount_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: Long Sword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Permanent Long Sword Mastery Bonus: 70%, Attack Power: +40, Final Damage: +23%, Speed: +30, Jump: +20, Attack Speed: +3 step, Ignores 30% of enemy defense.

primary.name: Time Generator
primary.shortDesc: Permanent Increases to Alpha's Time Force Recovery Rate: + 30%, 25% Chance of recovering 10 Time Force when attacking.

primary.name: Reinforce Body
primary.shortDesc: Permanently Increases Alpha's HP: +30%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +10, Elemental Resistance: +10%, Knockback Resistance: +100%, Max Time Force: +30%, Critical Rate: +30%

primary.name: Divine Leer
primary.shortDesc: Alpha's Critical Damage: +50% permanently\nDamage Over Time: 200% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec at 15% chance, and replenishing 5% of max HP
primary.desc: Successful attacks have a chance to apply a damaging debuff and recover %Max HP
details: Also permanently increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Rising Slash
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 3, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Swing your sword upwards to launch enemies up
details: Follow-up Attacks occur when you press the same button consecutively, for example <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/rising-slash.png} tip={Rising Slash (Beta, Lv. 100)}><bp_Follow-up Attacks share the same key as its Active Attack_>

primary.name: Air Raid
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 5, Damage: 230%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Swing your sword downward to bring enemies in the air back down

primary.name: Air Riot
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 5, Damage: 330%, Number of Attacks: 9, Max Enemies Hit: 6.\n[Shock Wave]: Damage: 330%, Number of Attacks: 9, Max Enemies Hit: 6. Chance of Stun: 100%, Duration: 3 sec.
details: Increased %Damage of attack
Now causes an exploding shockwave where attack landed<bp_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: Flash Cut
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 7, Damage: 205%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Swing your sword forward dealing damage to enemies

primary.name: Throwing Weapon
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 9, Damage: 380%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Throw your sword forward at an angle towards the ground

primary.name: Advanced Throwing Weapon
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 9, Damage: 550% every 0.3 sec, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Duration: 4 sec
details: Increases %Damage of attack
Instead of throwing your weapon at an angle, the sword will now slowly travel forward damaging and push enemies back<bp_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: Spin Driver
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 11, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Twirl your sword while pulling enemies in

primary.name: Wheel Wind
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 13 per 1 sec, Damage: 120% per 0.1 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Attack count: 2, Duration: 5 sec
primary.desc: Continuously spin around dealing damage to enemies in the area
details: You can move while spinning
Attack is cancelled when another attack is used

primary.name: Advanced Wheel Wind
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 13 per 1 sec, Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Attack count: 2, Duration: 7
details: Increases %Damage and duration
Attack will also pull in nearby enemies

primary.name: Giga Crash
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 15, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nCooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Slam down on the ground damaging nearby enemies

primary.name: Falling Star
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 17, Damage: 225%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6.\n[Shock Wave]: Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 225%, Number of Attacks: 3.
primary.desc: Jump upwards and slam down again damaging nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Groundbreaker
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 19, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 6.\n[Shock Wave]: Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 8.
primary.desc: Jump upwards a final time to slam a gigantic sword onto enemies
details: Creates a shockwave on impact that deals additional damage<bp_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: Mega Groundbreaker
primary.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 19, Damage: 380%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Max Hits: 10\n[Shock Wave]: Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 285%, Number of Attacks: 10\n[Shock Field]: Max Enemies Hit: 6 Duration: 5 Damage Over Time: 340% damage per 1 sec
details: Increases %Damage and number of hits but, reduces max enemies hit
Now creates a lingering Shock Field that continuously damages to enemies within it<bp_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: Heavy Sword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Permanently adds Heavy Sword Mastery Bonus: +70%, Critical Rate: +30%, Damage: +50%, Boss Damage: +30%, Attack Power: +80, Final Damage: +23%, Attack Speed: +3

primary.name: Solid Body
primary.shortDesc: Permanently Increases Beta's stats. Defense: +2000, Abnormal Status Resistance: +40, Elemental Resistance: +40%, Knockback Resistance: +100%

primary.name: Armor Split
primary.shortDesc: When Beta attacks there is a 20% chance of dropping the target's defense rate by 10% for the 20 sec\nCan be stacked up to 5 times
primary.desc: Beta's attacks has a chance to apply a stacking debuff that reduces an enemy's DEF

primary.name: Immune Barrier
primary.shortDesc: Respond to enemy attacks with a 25% chance of creating a barrier that blocks up to 50% Max HP for 5 sec.
primary.desc: After being hit by an attack, there is a chance to generate a barrier that blocks damage
details: You are invincible at the time the barrier is created

primary.name: Critical Bind
primary.shortDesc:
Beta's Attack Bind Chance: 10%, Duration: 4 sec Targets who are not stunned, including normal monsters, will be debuffed for the same amount of time.
Alpha's attacks gain +30% Critical Rate and +20% Critical Damage against targets who are stunned by Critical Bind.
The Bind effect will expire after inflicting damage proportional to the remaining effect duration.
Stunned enemies will resist Critical Bind, and be immune to stunning, for 35 sec. afterwards.
primary.desc: Beta's attacks have a chance to apply a debuff that binds enemies and makes them more vulnerable to Alpha's attacks
details: Alpha's attack gain %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage towards that enemy
There is a cooldown (35 secs) before an enemy can be binded again using Critical Bind

fifthMain.name: Chrono Break
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Time Force Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 5, Bind Duration: 10 sec
Bind Duration: Increases up to 100%, based on initial damage done
For 24 sec - Skill Cooldowns: -260% (Excludes skills not affected by cooldown reduction), Attack Speed: +2, Final Damage: +36%, slows nearby enemies.
Additional shock dealt 6 times, dealing 825% damage 12 times to up to 15 enemies when the skill ends. Shock prioritizes enemies hit by the attack and boss monsters with the highest max HP.
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Unleash a massive attack that binds nearby enemies
details: While active, nearby enemies are slowed, skills have reduced cooldowns and gain increased Attack Speed (by 2 stages), %Final Damage
When the skill ends, deal a final attack that prioritizes binded enemies and bosses with the highest Max HP first

Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF Break Mode where enemies are binded at the end of the attack<bp_Activating the skill by pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will trigger the opposite mode_>
Unaffected by Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Twin Blades of Time
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Time Force Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Invulnerable while casting skill
[Beta Link] 1st Hit: Deals 2200% damage 8 times
2nd Hit: Deals 2090% damage 12 times
3rd Hit: Deals 2640% damage 13 times
[Alpha Link] 1st Hit: Deals 2200% damage 8 times
2nd Hit: Deals 2090% damage 12 times
3rd Hit: deal 2640% damage 13 times
[Joint Attack]: Triggers an explosion 3 time(s), which deals 2420% damage 15 times. Triggers additional explosion for every 2 remaining linked attacks. Max Explosions: 5. Ignores Defense: +100%
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Perform a joint attack with Alpha and Beta before unleashing a final attack
details: If the attack is ended early, the final attack deals additional explosions for every 2 remaining linked attacks<bp_Final attack has 100% Ignore DEF_>
Invincible while casting

fifthMain.name: Shadow Flash
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Time Force Cost: 10, creates a sanctuary that lasts during cooldown. Max Enemies Hit: 8
Alpha: Deals Damage: 1430%, Number of Attacks: 6
Beta: Deals Damage: 1860%, Number of Attacks: 5
Skill Cooldown: Consumes 25 Time Force to destroy the sanctuary, move to the location, and attack up to 15 enemies.
Alpha: Activates a sword attack 3 time(s), Damage: 1145%, Number of Attacks: 15
Beta: Activates a sword attack 3 time(s). Damage: 1670%, Number of Attacks: 12
Cooldown: 40 sec
fifthMain.desc: Place down a sanctuary on the ground that can be teleported back to which destroys the sanctuary and deals a devastating attack
details: Alpha and Beta's Shadow Flash function separately

fifthMain.name: Ego Weapon
fifthMain.shortDesc: Alpha: Lazuli forms 9 blade(s), attacking 6 time(s) for 500% damage.\nBeta: Lapis forms 3 Heavy Swords, unleashing 2 shock(s) for 500% damage to 4 enemies\nCooldown: 15 sec
fifthMain.desc: Periodically, additional attacks appear for both Alpha and Beta while attacking
details: [Alpha]: Swords spin towards enemies dealing damage to enemies it collides with until it reaches the target
[Beta]: Swords strike down onto enemies dealing damage to surrounding enemies
Cooldowns are separate for Alpha and Beta
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthBoost.name: Moon Strike/Shadow Strike/Rising Slash Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Moon Strike/Shadow Strike/Rising Slash Final Damage: +180%
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Piercing Thrust/Air Raid Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Flash Assault/Flash Cut Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Blade Ring/Throwing Weapon Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Blade Ring Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Rolling Cross/Spin Driver Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Rolling Assault/Wheel Wind Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Wind Cutter/Giga Crash Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Wind Striker/Falling Star Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Storm Break/Groundbreaker Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Shadow Rain Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/wind-cutter.png} tip={Wind Cutter / Giga Crash}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: Time Piece
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Creates 3 Traces of Time when Assist hits 4 times.
Up to 10 Traces of Time can exist on one map, and are activated by Time Crystal when the opposite Zero's attack hits.
Trace recreation cooldown: 2 seconds
Time Crystal: attacks 4 times with 1440% damage
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Wind Cutter
masteryCore.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 17, Damage: 265%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 8.\n[Vortex]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 175% per 0.5 sec, Number of Attacks: 3, Duration: 3 sec.\nCooldown: 15 sec
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Wind Striker
masteryCore.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 19, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 8
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Storm Break
masteryCore.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 21, Damage: 535%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Max Hits: 10\n[Vortex]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 535% per 0.5 sec, Number of Attacks: 4, Duration of Vortex: 3 sec.\n[Shock Field]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Duration: 4, Damage Over Time: 370% damage per 1 sec, Normal Enemy Damage: +330% points
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Giga Crash
masteryCore.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 15, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 7\nCooldown: 15 sec
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Falling Star
masteryCore.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 17, Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 7.\n[Shock Wave]: Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 3.
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Groundbreaker
masteryCore.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 19, Damage: 610%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Max Hits: 10\n[Shock Wave]: Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 455%, Number of Attacks: 10\n[Shock Field]: Max Enemies Hit: 7 Duration: 5 Damage Over Time: 545% damage per 1 sec, Normal Enemy Damage: +340% points
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/rolling-cross.png} tip={Rolling Cross / Spin Driver}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/zero/rolling-assault.png} tip={Rolling Assault / Blade Tempest (Wheel Wind)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Spin Driver
masteryCore.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 11, Damage: 465%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nCooldown: 10 sec\n[Passive Effects - Time Piece Traces of Time Created: +1, Trace of Time Limit on Map: +3]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Wheel Wind
masteryCore.shortDesc: Time Force Cost: 13 per 1 sec, Damage: 365%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2, Duration: 7 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Rolling Cross
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Time Force Cost: 13, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 665, Number of Attacks: 12
Attacks with 3 blades 2 times
[Blade]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 900%, Number of Attacks: 3
When several blades land on a single enemy, Final Damage: -70% starting with the second blade
Cooldown: 10 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Rolling Assault
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Time Force Cost: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 680%, Number of Attacks: 12
Attacks with 3 blades 2 times
[Blade]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1090%, Number of Attacks: 4
When several blades land on a single enemy, Final Damage: -70% starting with the second blade
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: End Time
originSkill.shortDesc:
Time Force Cost: 40, invincible during casting
Grants the Detect and Strength effects at max stack
The mirror of illusion shatters, causing 17 Chase Cuts that attack 15 enemies with 1400% damage 6 times
Awakens the power of the transcendent, causing 22 time distortion(s) that attack up to 15 enemies with 1400% damage 8 time(s)
After that, a final blow that attacks up to 15 enemies with 1430% damage 14 times erupts 32 times.
Cooldown: 360 sec

boostCore.name: Chrono Break Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Chrono Break Final Damage: +60%, Duration: 30 sec, Final Damage: +46%

boostCore.name: Twin Blades of Time Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Twin Blades of Time Final Damage: +60%

notable.name: HEXA Wind Cutter / Giga Crash - 6th Job

meta: Zero is a STR warrior class that is not part of any class grouping. With Zero, you control two characters Alpha and Beta. Using different attacks will swap you between Alpha and Beta
